title: HAHAHHAHAHHAHAH NICE COMPANY
body:
I GET INTO GAME AND WHAT DO YOU KNOW I CAN'T SEE MY HUD. COOL. ALL GOOD. WHATEVER. CAN'T KILL THE ENEMY LANER BECAUSE I CAN'T SEE WHEN MY SHIT IS OFF COOLDOWN.

THAT'S GREAT. NOT LOOK AT THIS, I HAVE THIS AMAZING POWER OF FUCKING TELEPORTING AROUND LIKE IM IN FUCKING STAR TREK. OH CAN I GUESS WHY? MAYBE THE 33 FUCKING PING? I HAVE 33 MOTHEERFUCKIGN PING AND IM RUBBERBANDING. I JKUSTFUCKIGN DERANKED TO SILVER 3 FOR THE 8TH FUCKING TIME THIS EASON JUST BECAUSE YOU CANT MAKE A RELIABLE GAME. HOLY FUCK. "OOHO GIVE US A WALKTHROUGH OF WHAT HAPPENED BEFORE YOU COULDN'T PLAY THE GAME" I FUCKING STARTED THE GAME AND FUCKING QUEUED UP LIKE A DUMBASS AND PLAYED YOUR SHITTY GAME.

replies.body: Ooooooo that rubberbanding with 33 ping sounds like you might have been experiencing packet loss. Check out this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) with the network logs of that game, take a screenshot, and post it here for us to go over.
"TELEPORTING AROUND LIKE IM IN FUCKING STAR TREK." This cracked me up.

> [{quoted}](name=Korios,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lP3g8kvK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-08T00:49:15.927+0000)
>
> "TELEPORTING AROUND LIKE IM IN FUCKING STAR TREK." This cracked me up.

I'm glad I brought you joy in a time of aggrovation. <3
hey, nice to see a fellow s3'r!
